import React, { useState } from 'react' function AddRecipe() { const [input, setInput] = useState({ title: '', image: '', summary: '', spoonacularScore: '', healthScore: '', instructions: '', diets: [] }) let handleChange =(e)=> { if (e.target.name === 'diets') { return setInput({ ...input, diets: input.diets.push(e.target.value) }) } setInput({ ...input, [e.target.name]:[e.target.value] }) } return (
) } export default AddRecipe
